sense.def:
To test something
pomeni poskusiti nekaj uporabiti, da bi tako ugotovili, kaj tisto je, v kakšnem stanju je ali kako dobro deluje.

seg.quote: The BBC in Scotland wanted to test the range of their transmitters.
A number of new techniques were tested.

sense.def:
To test someone
pomeni nekomu postavljati vprašanja, da ugotovimo, koliko ve o nečem.

seg.quote: I will test you on your knowledge of French.

sense.def:
Dogodek ali položaj je
a test of a person or thing
, kadar pokaže dobre lastnosti ali učinkovitost neke osebe ali stvari.

seg.quote: ...the first major test of the President's policies.

sense.def:
A medical test
je pregled dela telesa; z njim zdravnik ugotavlja, koliko je nekdo zdrav.

To put something to the test
pomeni poskusiti nekaj uporabiti, da ugotovimo, kako uporabno ali učinkovito je.

seg.quote: The idea is being put to the test in a theatre in Paris.
